name: Dark Light Swap
description:
Light pushes light and dark pushes dark in this puzzle game about negative space. Switch between two characters and guide both to the exit in each level.

Controls

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys

Switch Player: X or Space

Undo: Z or U

Reset: R

Back: Esc or B

Update 1

Adjusted levels 2, 3, 6.

Update 2

Added tutorial text to level 3.
